title: Riot, You Got Chromas Right!!
body:
https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-rVBX5fx26-g/WL9W3czi0dI/AAAAAAAAffk/s0fBqaJBpHseh3PO7V66E6J35Q6OM1U3ACLcB/s1600/GjXMWXu.gif

These new Chromas for the upcoming Moo Cow Alistar, Meowkai, Dino Gnar, and Surprise Party Amumu are absolutely perfect. They offer a touch more than a plain recolor, and they add such flavor to the skins that these are very much worth the RP you charge for them. Up until these, Chromas have felt iffy and it's been a hard sell (at least for me) to justify having a real world cost - these new Chromas are well done, and give a little bit of extra oomph to the skins. You guys should definitely use these Chromas as the baseline for how Chromas should be in the future.
